title: 6 months of being a Freelance UI Designer
metadescrip: the success and lessons learned within the first 6 months of moving from agency to freelance designer
exerpt: Looking back 5 years, day dreaming about going freelance, I genuinely never thought Iâ€™d have the guts to do it. But here I sit. Just over 7 months (yes this post has been sitting here for a month or so) since I became a full-time freelance UI designer. Happier than I have been for a long time.
